Description: Professional services automation (PSA) software providing the maximum degree of process automation so that user intervention is only required to add value - not to administer.
Name: Harmony PSA

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Get a list of all contacts added or updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Get a contact by either their Email address or Contact ID.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Get a list of all contacts.

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Leads
Methods.Description: Get a list of all leads added or updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New Campaigns
Methods.Description: Get a list of all campaigns added since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Lead Sources
Methods.Description: Get a list of all lead sources.

Methods.Name: List Leads
Methods.Description: Get a list of all leads.

Methods.Name: Get Lead By Email
Methods.Description: Get a lead with a given email address.

Methods.Name: Get Lead By ID
Methods.Description: Get a lead with a given ID.

Methods.Name: List Companies
Methods.Description: Get a list of all companies in the system.

Methods.Name: Get Company
Methods.Description: Get a single company by its ID.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Get a list of all users of the system.
